name: GOL - Sky is Falling
description:
Games Over Lunch (GOL) - Sky is falling

Games over lunch, is a small initiative where we set out to build a small game (prototype) over a lunch hour (usually 30 minutes).

Sky is falling, is just like chicken little, avoid the acorns and rack up your score. If you hit an acorn the game is over :(

Looking to build the same game? Check out the Youtube video @ https://youtu.be/O_mZSsmIYAE

Looking for full source? You can purchase the final product on itch.io or if you are a patreon supporter at the source code level you can get it there as well.
